website_summaries.verdict: A basic set of classroom chairs that are durable and built to last.
pros: Pack of 6 blue chairs, available in multiple heights
Seat and back curved for optimal comfort
Lightweight chairs are stackable and easy to wipe clean
Rounded feet allow chairs to slide easily and quietly across the floor
cons: Simple chairs provide no stimulation for fidgety kids

customer_reviews.title: 1 Month into the School Year.
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are great., this one seems to be defective. They are well made this has to be a flaw because no child in my school weighs more than 200 pounds and this chair was not hit or thrown in my classroom. I work in an Elementary classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Susana Velasco Nino

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs, labels...not so much
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are great - bright colors, sturdy, well-made. I just wish they hadn’t used industrial strength adhesive for the two labels that are on the back of every single chair, or put the labels on the bottom. I’m using these in a homeschool room, and I don’t want ugly white warning labels on the backs of all my chairs. It’s going to be a major job removing them :( Other than that issue, great chairs. If I had known about the labels, I probably would have chosen something else just to save the work and time of removing labels., even if it cost more.
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Great little chairs!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome little chairs! We needed to add some chairs for our 4 and 5 year old group at church and these are perfect. We have carpet. So, I love the rounded ends on the bottom of the chair legs. It makes the chairs easier to slide-especially for the little kids. This Amazon brand is also almost exactly the same as a more expensive brand that is offered, but about half the price! If we need more chairs, we'll definitely order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Solid, sturdy chairs even a small adult can sit comfortably on.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandkids who are homeschooled. They fit perfectly with the ex-school table I found at a re-store. The chairs are perfectly sized for the three year old to sit comfortably up to the eight year old. Even I can sit comfortably on these chairs. I am a small adult being just 5”1’. They feel very sturdy and stack so easily a child can do it. They arrived on time very well packaged. I’m really very satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Houston

customer_reviews.title: Good price but Thin, won’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: Good price but they are very thin and I imagine will not last long. The blue plastic is so thin that it is actually discolored and see through on half the chairs I ordered (I ordered 18 chairs). You can hear when you move them that the legs are hollow and thin as well. Good price but I’m sure I’ll be replacing the set in 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: AmazonBasics 14 Inch School Classroom Stack-able Chairs
customer_reviews.text: These AmazonBasic 14in chairs have been used and abused for one year now. They still look new and hold up to daily cleaning without a problem. They are made just the right size for children 2 years through 5 years of age, however; they have supported full-sized adults on more than one occasion. When paired with the Lifetime adjustable height table these are the best choice for cost and durability. Compared with other brands of the same type and size these are a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel frank

customer_reviews.title: Love the chrome legs and how nice they stack.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant bc I wasn’t sure about the quality based on the price. I have others that are twice the price. I actually like them very much. They stack very nicely and seem like they will last. My 7 year old fits pretty good on the 12 inch ones. I love that the legs won’t chip like others i own.
customer_reviews.author: Jahaira

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy chairs for young children/preschool.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a whole bunch for my preschool. They seem sturdy and the kids like them. I like the wider base for kiddos to sit. Different color options was great too.
customer_reviews.author: Misty B.

customer_reviews.title: One damaged
customer_reviews.text: One out of 6 chairs broken straight out of the packaging. I dont want to return the whole package but there's no option to just replace or be refunded for one. Disappointed. $25 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable chairs
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for one of our classrooms at our church. They have been working great for our kids and are even pretty comfortable for adults to sit in as well. They are lightweight and easy to stack to move out of the way if needed. They work great for us when they are used only a few times a week. The only downside is that the blue plastic part of the chair doesn't feel as strong as some other school chairs. Time will tell if they will hold up, but they are an overall good chair for a classroom type setting!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but seems to be durable ebiught for our Sunday school room. Easy to stack, color is good. Probably not the best for daily and continuous use, but for us it was the best price and met our need.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect school chair
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are solidly constructed and perfectly designed for use in our first grade classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are high quality, sturdy chairs. I love the mix of colors. I bought 3 different sizes to accommodate different ages for a children's (ABA) therapy center.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Collins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my children's ministry worship room. The kids love them. They are bright and colorful and perfect for what I need!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Swanger

customer_reviews.title: Quality and affordable
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are easy to stack and comfortable (according to the kids). Material seems to be fairly sturdy and we haven't had any issues thus far. Price is good and we would definitely purchase again if we need more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these are NOT standard 18" classroom chairs
customer_reviews.text: these are far too small for secondary students or adults. they say 18" but are not truly that height.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not durable enough for classroom use.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to use in my classroom. They are a good size and a great price. However, I have had four of these break. They are breaking at the weld points. Students Lean/tip chairs, these do not hold up well to classroom use. The photo shows rusty welds. All four chairs that have broken show this rust.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you measure to get the right size.
customer_reviews.text: The chairs were for my classroom. They were perfect for it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our Cub Scout room. Worked great for our little table. Sturdy and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Fleenor

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased With Product
customer_reviews.text: Had ordered a different product and it was delivered broken - was very pleased that we found this as a replacement at it’s a better price and product than what we originally had purchased
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Spenner

customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the most part the children really haven’t got the chance to use them just yet
customer_reviews.author: diamond

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These stacks chairs are perfect for toddlers and adults. You can use them in the classroom as well as home. Perfect for the playroom and easy to clean. My children love them.
customer_reviews.author: Denis B.

customer_reviews.title: *CHAIRS WILL BREAK AS SOON AS YOU SIT ON IT*
customer_reviews.text: Watch out for when you sit down on these chairs they are not sturdy at all and will break on you like nothing the metal must be cheap or not put together correctly but other than it breaking on you their all right. I would've returned them and got some new ones but it's such a long process just to get some new chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Aldo

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for use in my classroom around a kidney bean table. Seats are larger than the chairs I currently have which makes them more comfortable. Just started using them but chairs seem sturdy and will serve the purpose for which I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our office. Easy to clean and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Good chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Good chairs and good price! However, I really don't need 6 of them for play room at home. So if there are 4 set available, it will be great!
customer_reviews.author: ICE AGE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for distance learning!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for distance learning and they work great. Perfect size for our 7 and 4 year olds. Coupled with a kidney show table it feels like a real classroom.
customer_reviews.author: SEB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The chair are wonderful I ordered the 10 inch chairs the only bad thing was I wanted the colors chair but I received all pink chairs but no problem Amazon fixed my issue. I’m happy now😊
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Smart budget buy.
customer_reviews.text: Anyone that buys school or commercial furniture knows that you get what you pay for. These are exactly that. A budget friendly chair that when they break you just buy new without worrying about any warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Brad C

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daycare center and they were very nice additions. I bought the 10 inch ones, which were low enough for my toddlers to touch the ground (mostly). They are pretty sturdy and I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Hailee Miller

customer_reviews.title: School Chairs
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are exactly what was intended to be purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are exactly what we needed for a new sunday school class. They are perfect for the littles but can also accommodate an adult. So glad I was able to find them here. Shipping was a breeze as well.
customer_reviews.author: TMPC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chairs!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great. No assembly. Came stacked in a huge box.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful for my kindergarden kids
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this product is that they are super helpful for the kids at my school, they seem to enjoy the chairs so far, they are very light weight, and very easy to clean, this chairs are ideal for children ages 3-6, they seem to be very durable, lets hope they are.
customer_reviews.author: Primo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap welding
customer_reviews.text: We ordered for 3 classrooms and 4 already broke this year and they are new. Do not order for a school. The price was great but the quality is NOT
customer_reviews.author: Harayl M Askotzky

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these chairs for my preschoolers ( ages 3-5) . I am pleased with this overall purchase. They fit very well and exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: McKinsey Bellar

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I love the chairs very sturdy beautiful colors my 3 kids love them we are having fun doing projects and homework very comfortable..
customer_reviews.author: marioly Belle-Oudry

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for school aged kids about 5-10 depending on their height. Well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon  Scharf

customer_reviews.title: Broken cross bar after 7 months of use in a kindergarten classroom.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set of 6 chairs for a 5 year old class. Out of the six, two of them have had cross bars under the chair break from the welding. They look brand new, but I can't use them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: LWCS

customer_reviews.title: Stackable and durable
customer_reviews.text: This product is great in sturdiness and love the fact that it is stackable. Makes it easier for cleanup and storage. The plastic part of the chair does scuff easily when stacking and that is ok because the dark color of the chairs block that.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica j

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bright colors and very sturdy! Easy to clean and works for a good variety of ages!
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs!
customer_reviews.text: They are a great weight and height for my nieces. They are wonderfully stackable and fit easily around our table. I love the bold bright colors. My nieces love having chairs that are their height.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Shuman

customer_reviews.title: Identical to pictures shown
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, light weight, good size for smaller children. Attractive shade of blue.
customer_reviews.author: Meisje webb

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters love them. Work well for lunches as well as at the craft The chairs came quickly and were in excellent condition
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Larimore

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice!
customer_reviews.text: I needed chairs to put into a school age classroom, because of the remote learning and these work perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Clee

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I like the chairs, it was as expected. It is strong, good quality! Even an adult can sit on it. Came faster then i expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lenir G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect. I love them so far. No issues at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Allen

customer_reviews.title: Width
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be a little wider than what they are, but overall my middle school students like them.
customer_reviews.author: Torey

customer_reviews.title: Impressed in quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our classroom of toddlers. Easy to clean and stack.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice
customer_reviews.text: As described and same as photo. Durable, cute student chairs and they are a good size!
customer_reviews.author: N Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Good price and quality chairs
customer_reviews.text: Chairs were a great price, and made very well. They arrived in a few days, and our kids loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Preschool chairs
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are super sleek and modern. They seem to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Best chairs to choose for childcare center!
customer_reviews.text: This are some great sturdy chairs that my students love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Harisha Dixson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: They were a hit with the little ones at the family Christmas dinner...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R Nastase

customer_reviews.title: Light weigh
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. Easy to move around and clean
customer_reviews.author: Juan Vargas

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics 16 Inch School Classroom Stack Chair, Chrome Legs, Blue, 6-Pack
feature_bullets: 6-pack of chairs for kids; ideal for a classroom, daycare center, rec center, or homeschool
Made of durable plastic; contoured seat and back for supportive, sitting comfort
Sturdy legs made of chrome-plated metal; ball feet promote easy movement across carpet and hard floors
Stackable design ensures space-saving storage; for indoor use; wipes clean with a damp cloth
Measures 17 by 15 by 27.7 inches overall (LxWxH); measures 16 inches from seat to floor; backed by an AmazonBasics 1-year limited warranty
Suggested Age Range: years to 12 years

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars207 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
